name: Cirro
description:
Cirro is a 3D puzzle exploration game in which the player harnesses the power of wind to travel between floating islands and solve puzzles in order to restore the islands to their original positions.

Currently in development with a project release date of May 2nd, 2023! Stay tuned for our first playable releasing on February 21st!

FEATURES IN THIS BUILD
  • Crystals that can be turned on and off using left click and right click to activate airstreams to unlock new areas [image 1 on right]
  • Sundial to change time of day quicker by using Q and E when facing the dial (Sundial can be found up the hill on the large center island) [image 2 on right]
